short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves DinseyPlus UX by ensuring the spacebar only toggles between play and pause for video. It also removes blue video outline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TL;DR: It makes spacebar play or pause the video. It also removes blue video outline/border.

Frustrated by the unpredictable behavior of the space key when using Disney Plus video player? Eliminate those annoying 10-second jumps, unexpected fullscreen toggles, or accidental subtitle settings changes with DisneyUX+ extension. 
This extension overrides Disney's default space key behavior, guaranteeing consistent play and pause functionality for your Disney videos, delivering a smoother and more dependable viewing experience. 
Enjoy seamless control over your Disney streaming, free from interruptions and unwanted actions!
